trans-unit.source: Defines a compensatable version of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: 定义 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity" /> 活动的可补偿版本。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity> implements the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ICompensatableActivity> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity> 实现 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ICompensatableActivity> 接口。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活动的用户定义名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 使用活动名初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompensatableTransactionScopeActivity> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Compensation SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自“补偿 SDK”示例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Compensation Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c847a694-9978-46af-aa80-5bd1833f813b).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[补偿示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c847a694-9978-46af-aa80-5bd1833f813b)。

trans-unit.source: The object that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件的对象。

trans-unit.source: The previously typed event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 先前键入的事件自变量。

trans-unit.source: Defines the processing procedure when the subscribed-to event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 定义发生订阅事件时的处理过程。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 操作的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to compensate an activity that is in the <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus.Closed" /> state.
trans-unit.target: 由工作流运行时调用，用于补偿处于 <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus.Closed" /> 状态的活动。

trans-unit.source: The activity must have a value of <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult.Succeeded" /> for its <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionResult" /> property in order to be compensatable.
trans-unit.target: 活动的 <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionResult.Succeeded" /> 属性的值必须为 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ExecutionResult" />，这样才能对其进行补偿。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> after operation has been tried.
trans-unit.target: 尝试操作之后的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTransactionOptions" /> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此实例关联的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTransactionOptions" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTransactionOptions" /> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 与此实例关联的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTransactionOptions" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates accessing the TransactionOptions property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何访问 TransactionOptions 属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Compensation SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自“补偿 SDK”示例。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Compensation Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c847a694-9978-46af-aa80-5bd1833f813b).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[补偿示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c847a694-9978-46af-aa80-5bd1833f813b)。
